function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying leading to shortage of essential goods","Impact":"Temporary shortage of products, creating inconvenience and potential distress for consumers","Mitigation":"Implement purchase limits, increase replenishment efforts, and educate consumers on responsible buying","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, online shopping platforms, and real-time stock tracking","People":"Consumers, retail employees, and supply chain workers","Owner":"Retailers, government agencies, and consumer advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Social media exacerbating panic buying","Impact":"Rapid dissemination of panic buying information leading to further panic and increased demand","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and moderation of panic-inducing content, providing accurate information and guidance on responsible buying","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, AI moderation algorithms, and official communication channels","People":"Consumers, social media users, and public health authorities","Owner":"Social media platforms, public health authorities, and consumer organizations"},{"Description":"Bottleneck in distribution channel due to surge in demand","Impact":"Difficulty in meeting demand, creating delays in product replenishment and distribution","Mitigation":"Extended operating hours, increased delivery trips, and improved inventory management","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, demand forecasting tools, and delivery optimization systems","People":"Retail employees, suppliers, and logistics workers","Owner":"Retailers, logistics companies, and regulatory agencies"}]}
